title: Glyphs behind font name in MS Word
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203085630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Glyphs%20behind%20font%20name%20in%20MS%20Word_4931.png)

As you can see on the image I have "notdef" glyphs behind my font name in MS Word. How do I remove or change the glyphs that are shown behind my font name?
author: Dirk Bakker

comments.content:
Hi Dirk,

Uncheck Greek in the Supported Unicode ranges and de notdef glyphs will be gone.

Pieter

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203085630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/afb_3703.png)
Thanks Pieter, now I can finaly get rid of those notdef's! :)
